jmr.expansion

Class LabelProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptorAdapter<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
      • jmr.expansion.LabelProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptor<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabelProperties.LabeledColorDescriptor

    public class LabelProperties
extends jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptorAdapter<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a descriptor of an image wich is composed by a list of labels and a list of properties specified at the moment of its creation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LabelProperties.EqualLabelsComparator
      Functional class that implements the comparation based on equality.
      static class  LabelProperties.InclusionComparator
      Functional class that implements the comparation based on Inclusion.
      static class  LabelProperties.LabeledColorDescriptor
      Special case when a LabelProperties is composed by two labels, one for describe the cathegory of the object and another one for describe its visual properties, specifically its dominants colors if specified it will use fuzzy colors space for label the colors
      static class  LabelProperties.OnlyLabelsComparator
      Functional class that implements the comparation between objects of this class.
      static class  LabelProperties.SoftEqualComparator
      Functional class that implements the comparation based on the soft-equality.
      static class  LabelProperties.WeightedLabelComparator
      Functional class that represents the comparation based on weighted labels.
      static class  LabelProperties.WeightedPropertiesComparator
      Functional class implemented for compare list of descriptors.

      • LabelProperties

        public LabelProperties(jmr.descriptor.label.LabelDescriptor label)
        Construct an object with no image, or properties just with a list of labels. It is used to make querys to the database. It will use the InclusionComparator
        Parameters:
        label - the label that will have the object

      • LabelProperties

        Parameters:

        classProperties - The visualProperties that will be calculated for the given image
